name: Beleaguered Castle
overview: Beleaured Castle is a solitaire game for the 128 in 40 columns, but with special features for those with both 40 and 80 column monitors. The four aces at the top of the screen forms the foundations. 8 columns of cards. The rest of the deck is dealt in 8 columns of 6 cards. This forms the tableau. To build up in suit and in sequence the four foundations from ace to king. The bottom card of each column is available for play. Us the right and left cursor keys to highlight the card that you wish to move. Cards may be moved to a foundation by pressing F. Cards may also be built own in sequence. C128 only. Included in Loadstar 128 #02.
